name: Welcome to Mars!
description:
Known Issues:

PLEASE click at the top left corner of the game box to get the keyboard and mouse focus to the game box!

Somtimes the game crashes right at start. Just refresh your browser or try another browser!

To Do:

There is no punishment if you don´t have enought sleeping places or electricity. I will add this within the next days. Also the generators can work without having coal in storage, it just counts into a negative area. A punishent for having to much o2 is missing aswell and there is something strange happens with the o2 after building a fitness unit .....

Description:

A strategic narrative Game about a venture of a Mars colonisation. You take over the role of the A.I with the task to manage the colony well. Therefore you have to manage Food, O2/Co2, Electricity and more!

To be Continued

I will develop this game further! If you like the game and wish for more content please leave me a comment or follow me!

Ludum Dare 41 Entry
